channel.title: How do I create an NPC or Object that heals?
channel.description:
Ok I am running a Project Insanity based source. In several private servers I have played, there is an NPC where if you click them it will heal you to full HP and also refill prayer points. Usually the servers have either Nurse Sarah or a fountain with the ability to heal.
A code for such and NPC or fountain would be a great help.

item.title: How do I create an NPC or Object that heals?
item.dc:creator: @Hunterme2 Hunterme2
item.description:
@Hunterme2 wrote:

Well I am using Project Insanity…soo…

Read full topic

You are getting errors, because You first of all didn’t convert it to your code, aka

Some servers use SM
some servers use Sendmessage

Get it? also the other methods have to be the same

item.title: How do I create an NPC or Object that heals?
item.dc:creator: @w-e_s-l_e-y w-e_s-l_e-y@hotmail.com
item.description:
@w-e_s-l_e-y wrote:

I’ve got this code for my nurse to heal:

if(NPCID == 959){ sM("You have been healed."); lowGFX(66, 0); currentHealth += 50; if (currentHealth > playerLevel[playerHitpoints]) currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; sendQuest("" + currentHealth + "", 4016); }
The NPCID == 959 stands for my npc id, in this case my nurse npc
sM is the message you get after healing
and so on.

Read full topic
